short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create QR code for current url.
short.tr: Mevcut sayfanın linki için QR oluşturur.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When you click extension icon, it shows you a QR code for current webpage. You can use this QR code to reach this website on another device like your smartphones.
